sense.def:
To utter sounds or words
pomeni izustiti zvoke ali glasove.

seg.quote: Sam opened his mouth, then quickly shut it again without uttering a sound.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
utter
poudarimo neko lastnost ali stanje.

seg.quote: To my utter amazement I was made managing director.
Judith is a complete and utter fool.
I am utterly convinced of your loyalty.
She was trying to look like a young lady but failing utterly.
